scripts.webpack-stats: npm run webpack-pre && webpack --json > /tmp/stats.json; npm run webpack-post
scripts.http-allocate-cert: if [ ! -d .keys ]; then mkdir .keys && openssl genrsa -out .keys/ssl.key 2048 && openssl req -new -key .keys/ssl.key -x509 -days 999 -out .keys/ssl.crt; fi; if [ ! -f .keys/ssl.key ] || [ ! -f .keys/ssl.crt ]; then echo '!!! KUI ERROR: the self-signed cert was not created successfully' && echo '!!! Make sure to provide at least one non-empty answer to the cert creation step' && echo '!!! Please try again' && echo '' && rm -rf .keys; exit 1; fi;
scripts.http: npm run http-allocate-cert && echo 'Now visit this url:'; echo 'https://localhost:8080/app/build/index-webpack-local.html'; (cd ../../../../packages && http-server --cors --brotli --ssl --cert ./kui-builder/dist/webpack/.keys/ssl.crt --key ./kui-builder/dist/webpack/.keys/ssl.key --silent)
scripts.webpack-cli-heap: cp node_modules/.bin/webpack-cli node_modules/.bin/webpack-cli.orig && awk 'FNR==1 {print $0, "--max-old-space-size=8192"} FNR > 1 { print $0 }' node_modules/.bin/webpack-cli.orig > node_modules/.bin/webpack-cli
